Title: Create the scenario diagram for all existing and upcoming user stories
Description:
**Acceptance Criteria:**

Each of the 4 user stories in sprint 1 ([SD-23](https://linear.app/sd-project/issue/SD-23/as-a-user-i-want-to-be-able-to-sign-up-as-an-admin-and-get-a), [SD-24](https://linear.app/sd-project/issue/SD-24/as-a-seller-i-want-to-signup-and-login-so-that-i-can-be-able-to-access), [SD-25](https://linear.app/sd-project/issue/SD-25/as-a-buyer-i-want-to-sign-up-and-login-to-my-account-so-that-i-can-buy) [SD-36](https://linear.app/sd-project/issue/SD-36/as-an-admin-i-want-to-be-able-to-escalate-privileges-so-that-the))  is covered in the scenario diagram.

Each of the 7 user stories in sprint 2() are covered in the scenario diagram.

**What you need to do:**

In draw.io you need to create a scenario diagram which encompases the above. 
Refer to slides_5 in course on what a scenario diagram is.
Creator: 2555154@students.wits.ac.za

Given that I am an authenticated user (buyer/seller/admin),

Then I get auto completions with full google places addresses.

Title: As any authenticated user, I can manage my cart for each store, so that I can quickly put together an order
Description:
Given that I am an authenticated user (buyer/seller/admin),
When I navigate to either a store view 'home/stores/\[id\]' or a product view 'home/stores/\[id\]/product/\[id\]' AND click `add to cart` ,
Then the cart for ONLY that store gets updated

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/b65fc42d-9509-4d42-9c28-e3168ed370e9/8c7304d2-a274-4b80-9fe5-ca401eefd5c9/320c31f2-043f-4ce5-b488-2aaa8f02c6b1)
Creator: 2555154@students.wits.ac.za

Title: As any user, I can view details and images of a product, so that I can know if it is what I want to buy
Description:
**Acceptence Criteria:**
Given that I am any user (buyer/seller/admin/unauthenticated) 
When I navigate to '/home/stores/\[id\]/products/\[id\]'
Then I can see 3 Images of a product, the price, the stock quantity, the description etc.

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/b65fc42d-9509-4d42-9c28-e3168ed370e9/39a05688-b575-4c5b-940d-910c1903a0cb/29205deb-c312-4c8f-bdae-d9fc58d33f64)
